_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map DE_SHISHI2008_V2


Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: March 12 2014

Here is the Navigation Mesh for nice small and fast-paced map [de_shishi2008_v2](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/66115) by shishi (released September 2008). It's an almost fully created from scratch and manually optimized .nav-file (because nav-file by Chizbone included in original map author's archive was not fully playable).

Well... bots have opportunity to use ALMOST ALL possible ways, with one insignificant exception: they can't use water part of the map! It not a problem of a Navigation Mesh, but design feature of the same map. Map author will sometime correct this defect probably... but if it doesn't occur - we will play on that is :-) In any case bots quite not bad cope with a mass meeting role.

NOTE: For possibility of comparison and in-game testing the original navigation file by Chizbone available to downloading with the [same map](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/66115).

Play and Enjoy! Also don't forget to write your responses and remarks ;-)

Credits and Gratitudes:
   shishi (for this fine and fun oriental atmospheric map, also for his other nice maps).

Additional Gratitudes:
   BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes),
   CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Valve Developer Community (for its learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

One More Big Trouble in Little China! :D
